ques: Explore only the appetizer section of the dinner menu. Take screenshots of all appetizer items and their prices. Click on any appetizer items that look clickable to see if there are additional details.
Find all vegetarian dishes across all menu sections. Take screenshots of each vegetarian dish you find, including their descriptions and prices.
Compare prices of all main course dishes. Scroll through the main course section, take screenshots of each dish with its price, and look for any special notes about portion sizes or modifications.
